formElement.label: Create workspace:
formElement.documentation: Choose whether you want to create a workspace or not

formElement.label: Delete workspace:
formElement.documentation: Choose whether you want to delete a workspace or not.

formElement.label: Workspace location:
formElement.documentation: Select workspace location for created workspace. Requires VS2013 and later.

formElement.label: Workspace template name:
formElement.documentation: Specifies a name for workspace template from which workspace will be created.

formElement.label: Workspace name:
formElement.documentation: Specifies a name for the workspace to create, edit, delete, or display information about.

formElement.label: Destination Directory:
formElement.documentation: A path relative to the job's workspace, where the source tree will be created.

formElement.label: Server Hostname (VS2008 and earlier):
formElement.documentation: TFS server host name. For example "TFSRMT08"

formElement.label: Server folder:
formElement.documentation: Specifies the name of a Team Foundation version control server folder.

formElement.label: Itemspec:
formElement.documentation: Specifies one or more files to check out. You can use wildcard characters here.

formElement.label: Version:
formElement.documentation: Optional version specification. The versionspec is the version of the item you want to retrieve.

formElement.label: Shelveset name
formElement.documentation: The name of the shelveset to restore.

formElement.label: Shelveset owner
formElement.documentation: The name of the shelveset owner.

formElement.label: Recursive:
formElement.documentation: Checks out all files that match the itemspec in the current directory and in all the subfolders of the current directory.

formElement.label: All:
formElement.documentation: Forces all files to be retrieved, not just those that are out-of-date.

formElement.label: Overwrite:
formElement.documentation: By default, the system does not retrieve an item if it is writable (that is, if its read-only attribute is cleared) on the client machine. This option overrides the default behavior and overwrites a writable item, unless the item is checked out.

formElement.label: Undo pending changes:
formElement.documentation: Discards one or more pending changes to files or folders.
